summary: Provides an iterator that consumes a data loader, applies a user‑defined inference function to each element (or each element within a batch), and groups consecutive outputs into packs that end when an item’s `is_last` flag is true, yielding each packed list before starting a new one.
business_intent: Enables downstream components to receive logically complete groups of inferred results from a streaming data source without worrying about batch boundaries or manual grouping, simplifying pipeline construction for tasks such as sequence reconstruction or chunked processing.
